text: Medishe is a heritage site just north of Jidali in Sanaag, Somalia. It was one of the first places bombed in African history, during raids against the Sayyidka. Sayyidka led a Dhulbahante state called Darawiish, a successor state to the Dhulbahante garadship. Medishe is a place settled by the Ugaadhyahan subtribe of Dhulbahante.Strike From the Sky, Richard Hallion, 2010, "1920, six left to raid the Mullah's headquarters at Medishe" ==References== Category:Geography of Somalia
title: Medishe
